file_content.text: We're getting rather good at killing these things, aren't we?
Miserable worm died before he could realize the utter futility of his dreams.
I'm sure you'll find a way to cope with the disappointment.
Take your sadistic tendencies somewhere else.
I forgot not everyone has the stomach for revenge. Pity.
After all he's done, I wouldn't have minded seeing him suffer a bit.
I suppose there are plenty more of these Esh-kha brutes to slaughter. Surely one of them can give me the despair I'm looking for.
